Job.Title: Part-Time Event Security – LA County
Job.Description:
Orchid Protection Services is seeking part-time Event Security Guards to help ensure the safety and security of attendees at concerts, conventions, and other large-scale events. This is an exciting opportunity to work in dynamic, fast-paced environments, protecting guests, staff, and performers while maintaining a professional presence.
Key Responsibilities: - Monitor and patrol event venues to ensure crowd control and overall security - Respond promptly to incidents, disturbances, or emergencies - Enforce venue rules and regulations while maintaining a professional demeanor - Conduct bag checks and access control to prevent unauthorized entry - Assist in evacuation procedures or emergency responses when necessary - Communicate effectively with event organizers, law enforcement, and emergency personnel - Provide a friendly yet authoritative presence to ensure guest safety
Qualifications & Skills: - Previous experience in event security or crowd management is a plus - Valid security guard license - Strong observational and conflict resolution skills - Ability to stay alert and composed in high-energy environments - Excellent communication skills for interacting with guests and event staff - Physically capable of standing, walking, and lifting as needed
Why Join Us? - Work in exciting venues with live entertainment - Flexible scheduling for part-time availability - Competitive pay and potential for future permanent security contracts - Opportunity to be part of a new and growing security team
Benefits: - Weekly pay - Sick time accrual - 401(k) retirement plan - Inclusive, culturally attuned team environment
Join Orchid Protection Services and be part of ensuring safe, memorable experiences at concerts and conventions! Apply today and let’s connect to discuss this opportunity further!
